data.title: Al Inara Tourism L.L.C Reviews
data.meta_description: Do you agree with Al Inara Tourism L.L.C's 4-star rating? Check out what 31 people have written so far, and share your own experience.
data.text:
Second time with Saad and Al Inara‚Ä¶

Second time with Saad and Al Inara Tourism and can‚Äôt recommend them enough! As a Family with two kids we always worried about what activities to choose but he goes the extra mile in helping and organising even our last minute Dhow Cruise which was amazing, and second time doing desert safari with them! Absolutely fantastic! If you want to be in safe hands, best prices and excellent knowledgeable service, choose them! Every time we come to Dubai we keep going on their tours!

Date of experience : April 29, 2023

Excellent service!

I had layover Dubai and decided to go for tour 6 h with Al Inara.. My guide Syed Suliman picked me up from airport and also bring me back on time for my next flight.. He was very polite, acknowledable shared lots of historical information.. Taken me to so many beautiful places around Dubai.. I had best time while I was exploring Dubai.. Thank you Al Inara and Syed Suliman for such a nice experience..

Date of experience : April 18, 2023

We booked Al InaraTourism through‚Ä¶

We booked Al InaraTourism through Facebook and all our correspondence was with Saad. Everything from start to finish was on point and professional and all questions were answered promptly and very informative . I booked the safari with quad biking , camel and sand dunes for myself and might ten year old son . As well as helicopter tour for another day. And our experience was simply amazing . Our guide for the safari was Alam who went above and beyond to make it a memorable day we will never forget and my son already wants to rebook again fir his birthday in a few months. It was truly an unforgettable experience and I would always use this company and highly recommend !

Date of experience : May 14, 2023

We had the BEST time on the Evening‚Ä¶

We had the BEST time on the Evening Dubai Dessert Safari! It was action packed and we did so many fun things. The Red Dune buggy experience was exhilarating and beautiful. The sand surfing was hard but so much fun. The food was ample and absolutely DELICIOUS!! Sometimes you go on tours offering a bbq buffet and the food is crappy. Not this tour. Our whole group raved about how yummy the food was. And the ambiance was gorgeous and felt culturally authentic. Our tour guide Asif Bettani was funny and really showed us a great time. And he took some AWESOME pictures for us! We would do this tour again for sure. Highly recommend!

Date of experience : November 06, 2022

A very professional company with very‚Ä¶

A very professional company with very professional people. Our Dubai & Abu Dhabi tour was organized in a very good & organized manner on time & the best of all. Our coordination Mr Saad is very knowledgeable and a wonderful person. He have helped us in every aspect by answering all the queries very humbly & politely. He has organized our tour in such a manner so that we can have the best views & the best time of that particular attraction. Mr Saad is a very good organizer and a very good human being.

I would recommend people to book their tours through Al Inara Tourism for a life time experience...

Al Inara Tourism good luck & keep spreading smiles everywhere...üòÉ

Date of experience : July 09, 2023

Me and my family recently returned from‚Ä¶

Me and my family recently returned from a trip to dubai with Al Inara travels . I had quite a memorable and enjoyable time in Dubai . The guide was highly knowledgeable, informative, professional and punctual. I learned so much from him during the tours. I was highly pleased with the staff and I was also very pleased with the hotel accommodations and the breakfasts that was served. Everything ran smoothly and efficiently. I would certainly use Al Inara travel again and have already referred your name and agency to a friend who is considering travelling abroad soon. Thank you for your professional assistance with these travel plans.

Best Regards,

Sarah Sajid

Date of experience : July 08, 2022

5 star Desert Safari trip

Myself, husband & 18 year old son, went on the desert Safari & had Alam as our tour guide. Alam was superb & made the whole trip from start to finish 5 star! We were treated like VIPs everywhere. We went in the car in the dunes which was so fun & we were all made to feel very safe. Then my son went on a buggy & my husband had a quad which they loved! Then off for dinner & live entertainment which was a brilliant experience too. Booking was simple & very reasonably priced compared to other companies we looked at. Honestly don‚Äôt book with anyone else! If you‚Äôre wanting 5 star treatment, these are your guys!! Thank you to Alam & Syed for everything

Date of experience : September 29, 2022

Exceptional Service and Awesome Private Yacht Cruise

I would definitely recommend booking your Dubai experiences and tours with this company. I received a very professional and prompt service right from the start. It was so easy to discuss options and my requirements via what‚Äôs app and responses were immediate, even late in the evening. I booked the 3 hour private yacht cruise during sunset and it was the most incredible experience on a gorgeous yacht. The crew members and captain were so friendly and helpful and ensured we were served drinks and looked after. They even went out of their way to ensure we captured perfect pictures and managed to get so awesome pictures of my family and I.

Nothing was too much trouble and the most special part was they arranged decorations (balloons and banners) at no extra cost for my mums 70th birthday.

I did a lot of research to find the best company and can honestly say this is one of the best!

Date of experience : April 11, 2023

Sunset desert safari

I came across syed & his company on a Facebook group. I was wanting to book a desert safari that allowed my daughter to be able to enjoy as well, as with being pregnant a lot of companies said pregnant ladies couldn‚Äôt do it. We also wanted to do the gender reveal in the desert & Syed made sure this was possible for us. On the day Alam our guide was just amazing. He went above & beyond to make sure our experience was fab from start to finish. Four of us did the dune buggy which was such a fun experience, would deffo recommend it. Dune bashing was also a lot of fun, Alam made sure we had the best experience while doing this. A couple of us tried the sandboarding which was fun but much more difficult that you think. The sunset & photos Alam took were just amazing. This whole experience was made even more memorable & special being able to do the balloon pop gender reveal üòç Alam was very knowledgeable & gave us lots of interesting facts as we were driving to the desert. The BBQ had plenty of choice for food & the entertainment was very traditional. Booking was simple & very reasonably priced compared to other companies we looked at. Honestly don‚Äôt book with anyone else! If you‚Äôre wanting 5 star treatment, these are your guys!! Thank you to Alam & Syed for everything

Date of experience : February 20, 2023
